name: Up To The Top
description:
The weather is so hot that Mr.lizard will be dehydrated out there within a minute. Luckily there are shadows all around to allow him to have a rest. Your mission is to help Mr.lizard get to the top so as to find what Mr.lizard desire.  = Mr.lizard
  • Control Mr.lizard using :

         W / Space / ↑ : Jump

         A / ← : Left

         D / → : Right

         Esc : Pause

= Shadow
  • Hide under the shadow to retain health
  • Every shadow in the game can be used to regain health
Space without shadow
  • Health bar will be slowly reduced

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- There are a total of 7 levels and each level can be jumped through so please try a few more times to up to the top and trigger the ending. - If there are any bugs or problems, feel free to leave a comment and I will try my best to solve them ;) - Web version is a little bit lag so maybe you can try to download the game to have a smoother experience. - Please enjoy!
